entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 01:10 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
